pageContext.claim: “We've never had this many people on the front lawn of the White House. So, congratulations. Just another record for the Nats. But, today, the First Lady and I are thrilled to welcome to the White House the 2019 World Series Champions, the Washington Nationals.”
pageContext.analysis: The Washington Nationals ceremony had roughly 5,300 people in attendance. This is less than a quarter the size of President Trump’s 2018 Easter Egg Roll, which 30,000 were expected to attend.
